summary: Two bumbling dance teachers help an awkward inventor sell his new invention and facilitate his romance with a beautiful socialite.
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Trudy Marshall|Robert Bailey|Matt Briggs|Margaret Dumont|Allan Lane|Sam Ash|Louis Bacigalupi|Brooks Benedict|Ruth Brady|Chick Collins|Jimmie Dundee|Edward Earle|William Haade|Sherry Hall|Charlie Jordan|Robert Emmett Keane|George Lloyd|Hank Mann|George Melford|Robert Mitchum|Nestor Paiva|Emory Parnell|Daphne Pollard|Lillian Porter|Cyril Ring|Charley Rogers|Florence Shirley|Arthur Space|Harry Tyler|George Tyne|Jay Wilsey
director: Director: Malcolm St. Clair (as Mal St. Clair)
title: The Dancing Masters
